attributes.action: Make nursing an apprenticeship style course, where placement are paid.
attributes.additional_details: Nursing course are majorly based on placements, where student are wrongly being classed in staff numbers and treated as staff members, working full time shifts. They are getting a bursary solely for these shifts when doing near enough the same work as a qualified nurse and working the same, if not more hours.
attributes.background: Stop nursing courses going through university and have more option for work based routes.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition, which calls for similar action:

Fund pay for student nurses and midwives for placement hours
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/746707
